name: Finger Soccer (itch)
description:
Play soccer on an airplane with your fingers! The goals are the gates to winning.

You play soccer/football on a tray table, with the twist that your fingers "kick"the ball around the field! Furthermore, a once highly-physical game fits on an airplane tray table. The soccer goals are the "gates" to winning---and spending time on a plane.

*Only compatible with hand tracking on Oculus Quest.
